'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is an [ability](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireAbilities/) in {{poe2}}.

## Description

{{Description|{{#var:description}}}}
'''Turn-based mode:'''
{{Description|The rod attacks with greater energy, slowing the wielder's Initiative, but hitting enemies around the target.}}

## Effects

{{#var:effects_formatted}}

## Notes

* The AoE deals roughly half the amount of base damage (9-13 vs 15-24) to enemies in a 1.5m area around the target, and is not applied to the original target (they receive the regular attack instead).
* '''''BENEFIT:''''' Your Rod attacks gain an AoE, so that they can affect multiple targets. Intellect affects this AoE range. While this Weapon Modal offers the best ability of combining melee-specialized spells, some Weapon abilities only affect a single target. However, if you can stack damage, then this makes for a nice backup for damaging a crowd. A Barbarian's Carnage will stack separately, but it should still affect your damaged targets.
* '''''PENALTY:''''' +50% Recovery Time after your character makes an attack with the Rod.
